sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const KYCForm = () => { const [currentStep, setCurrentStep] = useState(1); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ // Personal Information firstName: '', lastName: '', email: '', phone: '', dateOfBirth: '', nationality: '', // Address Information address: '', city: '', state: '', zipCode: '', country: '', // Identity Documents idType: '', idNumber: '', idExpiry: '', // Financial Information occupation: '', employer: '', annualIncome: '', sourceOfFunds: '', // Additional Information purpose: '', riskLevel: '', agreeToTerms: false }); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value, type, checked } = e.target; setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: type === 'checkbox' ? checked : value })); }; const nextStep = () => { if (currentStep < 5) { setCurrentStep(currentStep + 1); } }; const prevStep = () => { if (currentStep > 1) { setCurrentStep(currentStep - 1); } }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log('Form submitted:', formData); // Handle form submission }; const renderStepIndicator = () => { return (
{[1, 2, 3, 4, 5].map((step) => (
{step}
{step < 5 && (
)}
))}

Step {currentStep} of 5

); }; const renderStep1 = () => (

Personal Information

); const renderStep2 = () => (

Address Information

); const renderStep3 = () => (

Identity Documents

Document Upload

Please upload a clear copy of your ID document. Supported formats: JPG, PNG, PDF (max 5MB)

); const renderStep4 = () => (

Financial Information

); const renderStep5 = () => (

Additional Information

); const renderCurrentStep = () => { switch (currentStep) { case 1: return renderStep1(); case 2: return renderStep2(); case 3: return renderStep3(); case 4: return renderStep4(); case 5: return renderStep5(); default: return renderStep1(); } }; return (
{/* Header */}

KYC Verification

Complete your Know Your Customer verification to access all features

{/* Step Indicator */} {renderStepIndicator()} {/* Form */}
{renderCurrentStep()} {/* Navigation Buttons */}
{currentStep < 5 ? ( ) : ( )}
{/* Back to Dashboard */}
‚Üê Back to Dashboard
); }; export default KYCForm;
